prompt: In a remote clearing amidst an untouched forest, an ancient stone monument stands resolute, its weathered surfaces speaking of centuries past. An aurora borealis dances above, its luminous ribbons of green and purple swirling hypnotically against the deep blue-black sky. Captured from a low vantage point, the scene envelops the viewer, with the monument in the foreground providing a stark contrast to the ethereal display above. The composition is balanced, with the stone structure grounding the scene and the sky sweeping up and away, creating a sense of both rootedness and infinite possibility. The light is ethereal and soft, emanating from the stars and celestial events, casting a gentle glow across the landscape and highlighting the textures of the monument. Cool blues, purples, and greens dominate the color palette, imbuing the scene with a serene yet awe-inspiring mood. The air is crisp and clear, allowing the details of the night sky to be captured in stunning clarity. This image is rendered with the precision of high-resolution photography, every star and detail meticulously sharp, capturing the grandeur of the universe with professional artistry. The scene is an homage to the mysteries of the cosmos, perfectly blending the ancient with the astral, inviting viewers to ponder the vastness and beauty of the universe.
